sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ag-grid-vue
      style="width: 100%; height: 100%"
      class="ag-theme-alpine"
      :defaultColDef="defaultColDef"
      :columnDefs="columnDefs"
      :rowData="gridData"
      :columnTypes="columnTypes"
      :pagination="true"
      paginationPageSize=10
  >
  </ag-grid-vue>
</template>

<script>
import "ag-grid-community/styles/ag-grid.css";
import "ag-grid-community/styles/ag-theme-alpine.css";
import { AgGridVue } from "ag-grid-vue3";

export default {
  props: ['gridData'],
  name: "App",
  components: {
    AgGridVue,
  },
  setup() {
    return {
      columnTypes = {
        numberColumn: { width: 130, filter: 'agNumberColumnFilter' },
        medalColumn: { width: 100, columnGroupShow: 'open', filter: false },
        nonEditableColumn: { editable: false },
        dateColumn: {
          // specify we want to use the date filter
          filter: 'agDateColumnFilter',
          // add extra parameters for the date filter
          filterParams: {
            // provide comparator function
            comparator: (filterLocalDateAtMidnight, cellValue) => {
              // In the example application, dates are stored as dd/mm/yyyy
              // We create a Date object for comparison against the filter date
              const dateParts = cellValue.split('/');
              const day = Number(dateParts[0]);
              const month = Number(dateParts[1]) - 1;
              const year = Number(dateParts[2]);
              const cellDate = new Date(year, month, day);
              // Now that both parameters are Date objects, we can compare
              if (cellDate < filterLocalDateAtMidnight) {
                return -1;
              } else if (cellDate > filterLocalDateAtMidnight) {
                return 1;
              } else {
                return 0;
              }
            },
      columnDefs: [
        { headerName: "ФИО", field: "name", width: 280},
        { headerName: "Должность/Место работы", field: "infoWorkPlaces", width: 280},
        { headerName: "Ставка", field: "stake",  editable: true, width: 120},
        { headerName: "Часы на ставку", field: "hoursOnStake", editable: true, width: 140},
        { headerName: "Кол-во часов на часовую оплату", field: "hours", width: 160},
        {
          headerName: 'Бюджет',
          children: [
            { headerName: "Планируемое кол-во часов", field: "bHoursPlaned", width: 140},
            { headerName: "Фактическое кол-во часов", field: "bHoursReal", editable: true, width: 140},
            { headerName: "Разница", field: "bHoursDiff", width: 140},
          ],
        },
        {
          headerName: 'Контракт',
          children: [
            {headerName: "Планируемое кол-во часов", field: "cHoursPlaned", width: 140},
            {headerName: "Фактическое кол-во часов", field: "cHoursReal", width: 140},
            {headerName: "Разница", field: "cHoursDiff", width: 140},
          ],
        },
        {
          headerName: 'Общее',
          children: [
            {headerName: "Планируемое кол-во часов", field: "hoursPlaned", width: 140},
            {headerName: "Фактическое кол-во часов", field: "hoursReal", width: 140},
            {headerName: "Разница", field: "hoursDiff", width: 140},
          ],
        },
        { headerName: "Год", field: "year", width: 100},
      ],
      defaultColDef: {
        sortable: true,
        filter: true,
        wrapHeaderText: true,
        wrapText: true,
        autoHeight: true,
        autoHeaderHeight: true,
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style>
.ag-theme-alpine {
  --ag-header-foreground-color: white;
  --ag-header-background-color: #4B79BB;
  --ag-header-cell-hover-background-color: #355787;
  --ag-header-cell-moving-background-color: #355787;
}
.ag-theme-alpine .ag-header-group-cell {
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 22px;
  border: white 1px solid;
}
.ag-theme-alpine .ag-header-group-cell-label{
  justify-content: center;
}
.ag-theme-alpine .ag-header-cell {
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 14px;
  border: white 2px solid;
}
</style>
